Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the game’s narrative document to understand the thematic requirements.
Research various level designs that align with the game’s narrative. Look for inspiration from similar games and document findings.
Compile notes and images related to researched level designs for reference.
Start creating rough sketches of multiple level layouts based on the research.
Identify key gameplay areas within the sketches. Make annotations for reference.
Send the rough sketches to @lvdn-1 (Level Designer) for initial comments and feedback.
